# MLShapedArrayBufferLayout.lastMajorContiguous

**Case**

Layout scalars contiguously in last-major order.

## Declaration

```swift
case lastMajorContiguous
```

## Buffer layouts

- **MLShapedArrayBufferLayout.firstMajorContiguous**: Layout scalars contiguously in first-major order.
- **MLShapedArrayBufferLayout.strides(_:)**: Layout scalars according to the strides.
